entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 09:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Temperature: 10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 42 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 11 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then rain. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
